00124 __STATIC_INLINE void USBHAL_DisableGlobalInt( void )
00125 {
00126   USB->GAHBCFG &= ~USB_GAHBCFG_GLBLINTRMSK;
00127 }
00128 
00129 __STATIC_INLINE void USBHAL_DisablePhyPins( void )

00131   USB->ROUTE = _USB_ROUTE_RESETVALUE;
00132 }

00136   USB->IEN = _USB_IEN_RESETVALUE;

00139 __STATIC_INLINE void USBHAL_EnableGlobalInt( void )

00141   USB->GAHBCFG |= USB_GAHBCFG_GLBLINTRMSK;

00144 __STATIC_INLINE void USBHAL_FlushRxFifo( void )
00145 {
00146   USB->GRSTCTL = USB_GRSTCTL_RXFFLSH;
00147   while ( USB->GRSTCTL & USB_GRSTCTL_RXFFLSH ) {}
00148 }
00149 
00150 __STATIC_INLINE void USBHAL_FlushTxFifo( uint8_t fifoNum )
00151 {
00152   USB->GRSTCTL = USB_GRSTCTL_TXFFLSH | ( fifoNum << _USB_GRSTCTL_TXFNUM_SHIFT );
00153   while ( USB->GRSTCTL & USB_GRSTCTL_TXFFLSH ) {}
00154 }

00156 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t USBHAL_GetCoreInts( void )
00157 {
00158   uint32_t retVal;
00159 
00160   retVal  = USB->GINTSTS;
00161   retVal &= USB->GINTMSK;
00162 
00163   return retVal;
00164 }

00166 __STATIC_INLINE bool USBHAL_VbusIsOn( void )
00167 {
00168   return ( USB->STATUS & USB_STATUS_VREGOS ) != 0;

00171 #if defined( USB_DEVICE )
00172 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_ActivateEp( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep, bool forceIdle )
00173 {
00174 #define DIEP_MPS_EPTYPE_TXFNUM_MASK ( _USB_DIEP_CTL_MPS_MASK    | \
00175                                       _USB_DIEP_CTL_EPTYPE_MASK | \
00176                                       _USB_DIEP_CTL_TXFNUM_MASK )
00177 #define DOEP_MPS_EPTYPE_MASK        ( _USB_DOEP_CTL_MPS_MASK    | \
00178                                       _USB_DOEP_CTL_EPTYPE_MASK )
00179   uint32_t daintmask, depctl;
00180 
00181   if ( forceIdle )
00182     ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;
00183 
00184   if ( ep->in )
00185   {
00186     daintmask = ep->mask;
00187     depctl = USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL & ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK;
00188 
00189     if ( !( depctl & USB_DIEP_CTL_USBACTEP ) )
00190     {
00191       depctl = ( depctl                                     &
00192                  ~( DIEP_MPS_EPTYPE_TXFNUM_MASK          |
00193                     USB_DIEP_CTL_STALL                     )  ) |
00194                ( ep->packetSize << _USB_DIEP_CTL_MPS_SHIFT    ) |
00195                ( ep->type       << _USB_DIEP_CTL_EPTYPE_SHIFT ) |
00196                ( ep->txFifoNum  << _USB_DIEP_CTL_TXFNUM_SHIFT ) |
00197                USB_DIEP_CTL_SETD0PIDEF                          |
00198                USB_DIEP_CTL_USBACTEP                            |
00199                USB_DIEP_CTL_SNAK;
00200     }
00201     else
00202     {
00203       depctl |= USB_DIEP_CTL_SETD0PIDEF;
00204     }
00205     USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL = depctl;
00206   }
00207   else
00208   {
00209     daintmask = ep->mask << _USB_DAINTMSK_OUTEPMSK0_SHIFT;
00210     depctl = USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].CTL & ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK;
00211 
00212     if ( !( depctl & USB_DOEP_CTL_USBACTEP ) )
00213     {
00214       depctl = ( depctl                                     &
00215                  ~( DOEP_MPS_EPTYPE_MASK                 |
00216                     USB_DOEP_CTL_STALL                     )  ) |
00217                ( ep->packetSize << _USB_DOEP_CTL_MPS_SHIFT    ) |
00218                ( ep->type       << _USB_DOEP_CTL_EPTYPE_SHIFT ) |
00219                USB_DOEP_CTL_SETD0PIDEF                          |
00220                USB_DOEP_CTL_USBACTEP                            |
00221                USB_DOEP_CTL_SNAK;
00222     }
00223     else
00224     {
00225       depctl |= USB_DOEP_CTL_SETD0PIDEF;
00226     }
00227     USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].CTL = depctl;
00228   }
00229 
00230   /* Enable interrupt for this EP */
00231   USB->DAINTMSK |= daintmask;
00232 
00233 #undef DIEP_MPS_EPTYPE_TXFNUM_MASK
00234 #undef DOEP_MPS_EPTYPE_MASK
00235 }
00236 
00237 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_ClearRemoteWakeup( void )
00238 {
00239   USB->DCTL &= ~( DCTL_WO_BITMASK | USB_DCTL_RMTWKUPSIG );
00240 }
00241 
00242 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_DeactivateEp( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00243 {
00244   uint32_t daintmask;
00245 
00246   if ( ep->in )
00247   {
00248     USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL = 0;
00249     daintmask = ep->mask;
00250   }
00251   else
00252   {
00253     USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].CTL = 0;
00254     daintmask = ep->mask << _USB_DAINTMSK_OUTEPMSK0_SHIFT;
00255   }
00256 
00257   /* Disable interrupt for this EP */
00258   USB->DAINTMSK &= ~daintmask;
00259 }
00260 
00261 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_EnableInts( USBD_Device_TypeDef *dev )
00262 {
00263   uint32_t mask;
00264 
00265   /* Disable all interrupts. */
00266   USB->GINTMSK = 0;
00267 
00268   /* Clear pending interrupts */
00269   USB->GINTSTS = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00270 
00271   mask = USB_GINTMSK_USBSUSPMSK     |
00272          USB_GINTMSK_USBRSTMSK      |
00273          USB_GINTMSK_ENUMDONEMSK    |
00274          USB_GINTMSK_IEPINTMSK      |
00275          USB_GINTMSK_OEPINTMSK      |
00276          USB_GINTMSK_WKUPINTMSK;
00277 
00278   if ( dev->callbacks->sofInt )
00279   {
00280     mask |= USB_GINTMSK_SOFMSK;
00281   }
00282 
00283   USB->GINTMSK = mask;
00284 }
00285 
00286 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_EnableUsbResetAndSuspendInt( void )
00287 {
00288   /* Disable all interrupts. */
00289   USB->GINTMSK = 0;
00290 
00291   USB->GINTMSK = USB_GINTMSK_USBRSTMSK | USB_GINTMSK_USBSUSPMSK;
00292 }
00293 
00294 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_Ep0Activate( uint32_t ep0mps )
00295 {
00296   USB->DCTL = ( USB->DCTL & ~DCTL_WO_BITMASK ) | USB_DCTL_CGNPINNAK;
00297 
00298   USB->DOEP0CTL = ( USB->DOEP0CTL & ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK )
00299                   | USB_DOEP0CTL_CNAK | USB_DOEP0CTL_EPENA
00300                   | ep0mps;
00301 }
00302 
00303 __STATIC_INLINE bool USBDHAL_EpIsStalled( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00304 {
00305   bool retVal = false;
00306   uint16_t stallStatus;
00307 
00308   if ( USBDHAL_GetStallStatusEp( ep, &stallStatus ) == USB_STATUS_OK )
00309   {
00310     retVal = stallStatus & 1 ? true : false;
00311   }
00312   return retVal;
00313 }

00315 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t USBDHAL_GetAllInEpInts( void )
00316 {
00317   uint32_t retVal;
00318 
00319   retVal  = USB->DAINT;
00320   retVal &= USB->DAINTMSK;
00321   return retVal & 0xFFFF;
00322 }
00323 
00324 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t USBDHAL_GetAllOutEpInts( void )
00325 {
00326   uint32_t retVal;
00327 
00328   retVal  = USB->DAINT;
00329   retVal &= USB->DAINTMSK;
00330   return retVal >> 16;
00331 }
00332 
00333 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t USBDHAL_GetInEpInts( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00334 {
00335   uint32_t retVal, msk;
00336 
00337   msk    = USB->DIEPMSK;
00338   retVal = USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].INT;
00339 
00340   return retVal & msk;
00341 }
00342 
00343 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t USBDHAL_GetOutEpInts( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00344 {
00345   uint32_t retVal;
00346 
00347   retVal  = USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].INT;
00348 #if defined( USB_DOEP0INT_STUPPKTRCVD )
00349   retVal &= USB->DOEPMSK | USB_DOEP0INT_STUPPKTRCVD;
00350 #else
00351   retVal &= USB->DOEPMSK;
00352 #endif
00353 
00354   return retVal;
00355 }
00356 
00357 __STATIC_INLINE USB_Status_TypeDef USBDHAL_GetStallStatusEp(
00358                                    USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep, uint16_t *halt )
00359 {
00360   uint32_t depctl, eptype;
00361   USB_Status_TypeDef retVal = USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00362 
00363   if ( ep->in == true )
00364   {
00365     depctl = USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL;
00366     eptype = depctl & _USB_DIEP_CTL_EPTYPE_MASK;
00367 
00368     if (( eptype == DIEPCTL_EPTYPE_INTR ) || ( eptype == DIEPCTL_EPTYPE_BULK ))
00369     {
00370       *halt = depctl & USB_DIEP_CTL_STALL ? 1 : 0;
00371       retVal = USB_STATUS_OK;
00372     }
00373   }
00374   else
00375   {
00376     depctl = USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].CTL;
00377     eptype = depctl & _USB_DOEP_CTL_EPTYPE_MASK;
00378 
00379     if (( eptype == DOEPCTL_EPTYPE_INTR ) || ( eptype == DOEPCTL_EPTYPE_BULK ))
00380     {
00381       *halt = depctl & USB_DOEP_CTL_STALL ? 1 : 0;
00382       retVal = USB_STATUS_OK;
00383     }
00384   }
00385 
00386   return retVal;
00387 }
00388 
00389 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_ReenableEp0Setup( USBD_Device_TypeDef *dev )
00390 
00391 {
00392   USB->DOEP0DMAADDR = (uint32_t)dev->setupPkt;
00393   USB->DOEP0CTL = ( USB->DOEP0CTL & ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK )
00394                   | USB_DOEP0CTL_EPENA
00395                   | dev->ep0MpsCode;
00396 }

00398 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_SetAddr( uint8_t addr )
00399 {
00400   USB->DCFG = ( USB->DCFG                    &
00401                 ~_USB_DCFG_DEVADDR_MASK        ) |
00402               (addr << _USB_DCFG_DEVADDR_SHIFT );
00403 }

00410 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_SetEp0OutDmaPtr( uint8_t* addr )

00415 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_SetEPDISNAK( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00416 {
00417   if ( ep->in )
00418   {
00419     USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL = ( USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL   &
00420                                   ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK            ) |
00421                                 USB_DIEP_CTL_SNAK                 |
00422                                 USB_DIEP_CTL_EPDIS;
00423   }
00424   else
00425   {
00426     USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].CTL = ( USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].CTL   &
00427                                    ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK             ) |
00428                                  USB_DOEP_CTL_EPENA;
00429 
00430     USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].CTL = ( USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].CTL   &
00431                                    ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK             ) |
00432                                  USB_DOEP_CTL_SNAK                  |
00433                                  USB_DOEP_CTL_EPDIS;
00434   }
00435 }
00436 
00437 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_SetRemoteWakeup( void )
00438 {
00439   USB->DCTL = ( USB->DCTL & ~DCTL_WO_BITMASK ) | USB_DCTL_RMTWKUPSIG;
00440 }
00441 
00442 __STATIC_INLINE USB_Status_TypeDef USBDHAL_StallEp( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00443 {
00444   uint32_t depctl, eptype;
00445   USB_Status_TypeDef retVal = USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00446 
00447   if ( ep->in == true )
00448   {
00449     depctl = USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL & ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK;
00450     eptype = depctl & _USB_DIEP_CTL_EPTYPE_MASK;
00451 
00452     if ( eptype != DIEPCTL_EPTYPE_ISOC )
00453     {
00454       if ( depctl & USB_DIEP_CTL_EPENA )
00455       {
00456         depctl |= USB_DIEP_CTL_EPDIS;
00457       }
00458       USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL = depctl | USB_DIEP_CTL_STALL;
00459       retVal = USB_STATUS_OK;
00460     }
00461   }
00462   else
00463   {
00464     depctl = USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].CTL & ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK;
00465     eptype = depctl & _USB_DOEP_CTL_EPTYPE_MASK;
00466 
00467     if ( eptype != DIEPCTL_EPTYPE_ISOC )
00468     {
00469       USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].CTL = depctl | USB_DOEP_CTL_STALL;
00470       retVal = USB_STATUS_OK;
00471     }
00472   }
00473 
00474   return retVal;
00475 }

00477 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_StartEp0In( uint32_t len, uint32_t ep0mps )
00478 {
00479   USB->DIEP0TSIZ = ( len << _USB_DIEP0TSIZ_XFERSIZE_SHIFT   ) |
00480                    ( 1   << _USB_DIEP0TSIZ_PKTCNT_SHIFT     );
00481 
00482   USB->DIEP0CTL = ( USB->DIEP0CTL & ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK )
00483                   | USB_DIEP0CTL_CNAK | USB_DIEP0CTL_EPENA
00484                   | ep0mps;
00485 }
00486 
00487 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_StartEp0Out( uint32_t len, uint32_t ep0mps )
00488 {
00489   USB->DOEP0TSIZ = ( len << _USB_DOEP0TSIZ_XFERSIZE_SHIFT ) |
00490                    ( 1   << _USB_DOEP0TSIZ_PKTCNT_SHIFT   );
00491 
00492   USB->DOEP0CTL = ( USB->DOEP0CTL & ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK )
00493                   | USB_DOEP0CTL_CNAK | USB_DOEP0CTL_EPENA
00494                   | ep0mps;
00495 }

00497 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_StartEp0Setup( USBD_Device_TypeDef *dev )
00498 {
00499   dev->ep[ 0 ].in = false;
00500 
00501 #if defined( USB_DOEP0INT_STUPPKTRCVD )
00502   USB->DOEP0TSIZ = ( 8*3 << _USB_DOEP0TSIZ_XFERSIZE_SHIFT ) |
00503                    ( 1   << _USB_DOEP0TSIZ_PKTCNT_SHIFT   ) |
00504                    ( 3   << _USB_DOEP0TSIZ_SUPCNT_SHIFT   );
00505 #else
00506   USB->DOEP0TSIZ = 3 << _USB_DOEP0TSIZ_SUPCNT_SHIFT;
00507 #endif
00508 
00509   dev->setup = dev->setupPkt;
00510   USB->DOEP0DMAADDR = (uint32_t)dev->setup;
00511 
00512 #if defined( USB_DOEP0INT_STUPPKTRCVD )
00513   USB->DOEP0CTL = ( USB->DOEP0CTL & ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK )
00514                   | USB_DOEP0CTL_EPENA
00515                   | dev->ep0MpsCode;
00516 #else
00517   USB->DOEP0CTL = ( USB->DOEP0CTL & ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK )
00518                   | USB_DOEP0CTL_CNAK | USB_DOEP0CTL_EPENA
00519                   | dev->ep0MpsCode;
00520 #endif
00521 }
00522 
00523 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_StartEpIn( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00524 {
00525   uint32_t pktcnt, xfersize;
00526 
00527   if ( ep->remaining == 0 )     /* ZLP ? */
00528   {
00529     pktcnt = 1;
00530     xfersize = 0;
00531   }
00532   else
00533   {
00534     pktcnt = ( ep->remaining - 1 + ep->packetSize ) / ep->packetSize;
00535     xfersize = ep->remaining;
00536   }
00537 
00538   USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].TSIZ =
00539                 ( USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].TSIZ                &
00540                   ~DIEP_XFERSIZE_PKTCNT_MASK                  ) |
00541                 ( xfersize << _USB_DIEP_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_SHIFT   ) |
00542                 ( pktcnt   << _USB_DIEP_TSIZ_PKTCNT_SHIFT     );
00543 
00544   USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].DMAADDR = (uint32_t)ep->buf;
00545   USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL =
00546                   ( USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL & ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK ) |
00547                   USB_DIEP_CTL_CNAK                                  |
00548                   USB_DIEP_CTL_EPENA;
00549 }
00550 
00551 __STATIC_INLINE void USBDHAL_StartEpOut( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00552 {
00553   uint32_t pktcnt, xfersize;
00554 
00555   if ( ep->remaining == 0 )     /* ZLP ? */
00556   {
00557     pktcnt = 1;
00558     xfersize = ep->packetSize;
00559   }
00560   else
00561   {
00562     pktcnt = ( ep->remaining - 1 + ep->packetSize ) / ep->packetSize;
00563     xfersize = pktcnt * ep->packetSize;
00564   }
00565 
00566   USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].TSIZ =
00567                   ( USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].TSIZ               &
00568                     ~DOEP_XFERSIZE_PKTCNT_MASK                  ) |
00569                   ( xfersize << _USB_DOEP_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_SHIFT   ) |
00570                   ( pktcnt   << _USB_DOEP_TSIZ_PKTCNT_SHIFT     );
00571 
00572   ep->hwXferSize = xfersize;
00573   USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].DMAADDR = (uint32_t)ep->buf;
00574   USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].CTL =
00575                           ( USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].CTL  &
00576                             ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK             ) |
00577                           USB_DOEP_CTL_CNAK                  |
00578                           USB_DOEP_CTL_EPENA;
00579 }
00580 
00581 __STATIC_INLINE USB_Status_TypeDef USBDHAL_UnStallEp( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00582 {
00583   uint32_t depctl, eptype;
00584   USB_Status_TypeDef retVal = USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00585 
00586   if ( ep->in == true )
00587   {
00588     depctl = USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL & ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK;
00589     eptype = depctl & _USB_DIEP_CTL_EPTYPE_MASK;
00590 
00591     if (( eptype == DIEPCTL_EPTYPE_INTR ) || ( eptype == DIEPCTL_EPTYPE_BULK ))
00592     {
00593       depctl |=  USB_DIEP_CTL_SETD0PIDEF;
00594       depctl &= ~USB_DIEP_CTL_STALL;
00595       USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL = depctl;
00596       retVal = USB_STATUS_OK;
00597     }
00598   }
00599   else
00600   {
00601     depctl = USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].CTL & ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK;
00602     eptype = depctl & _USB_DOEP_CTL_EPTYPE_MASK;
00603 
00604     if (( eptype == DIEPCTL_EPTYPE_INTR ) || ( eptype == DIEPCTL_EPTYPE_BULK ))
00605     {
00606       depctl |=  USB_DOEP_CTL_SETD0PIDEF;
00607       depctl &= ~USB_DOEP_CTL_STALL;
00608       USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].CTL = depctl;
00609       retVal = USB_STATUS_OK;
00610     }
00611   }
00612 
00613   return retVal;
00614 }
00615 #endif /* defined( USB_DEVICE ) */
00616 
00617 #if defined( USB_HOST )
00618 __STATIC_INLINE void USBHHAL_HCActivate( int hcnum, uint32_t hcchar, bool intep )
00619 {
00620   uint32_t oddframe;
00621 
00622   if ( intep )
00623   {
00624     oddframe = USB->HFNUM & 1;
00625 
00626     USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR =
00627                     ( hcchar &
00628                       ~( USB_HC_CHAR_CHDIS | _USB_HC_CHAR_ODDFRM_MASK ) ) |
00629 
00630                     /* Schedule INT transfers to start in next frame. */
00631                     ( oddframe & 1 ? 0 : USB_HC_CHAR_ODDFRM             ) |
00632 
00633                     USB_HC_CHAR_CHENA;
00634   }
00635   else
00636   {
00637     USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR = ( hcchar & ~USB_HC_CHAR_CHDIS ) |
00638                               USB_HC_CHAR_CHENA;
00639   }
00640 }
00641 
00642 __STATIC_INLINE bool USBHHAL_InitializedAndPowered( void )
00643 {
00644   if ( ( USB->ROUTE & USB_ROUTE_PHYPEN ) &&
00645        ( USB->HPRT  & USB_HPRT_PRTPWR  )    )
00646     return true;
00647   return false;
00648 }
00649 
00650 __STATIC_INLINE void USBHHAL_EnableInts( void )
00651 {
00652   /* Disable all interrupts. */
00653   USB->GINTMSK = 0;
00654 
00655   /* Clear pending OTG interrupts */
00656   USB->GOTGINT = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00657 
00658   /* Clear pending interrupts */
00659   USB->GINTSTS = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00660 
00661   USB->GINTMSK = USB_GINTMSK_PRTINTMSK     |
00662                  USB_GINTMSK_HCHINTMSK     |
00663                  USB_GINTMSK_DISCONNINTMSK;
00664 }
00665 
00666 __STATIC_INLINE uint16_t USBHHAL_GetFrameNum( void )
00667 {
00668   return USB->HFNUM;
00669 }
00670 
00671 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t USBHHAL_GetHcChar( uint8_t hcnum )
00672 {
00673   return USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR;
00674 }
00675 
00676 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t USBHHAL_GetHcInts( uint8_t hcnum )
00677 {
00678   uint32_t retVal;
00679 
00680   retVal  = USB->HC[ hcnum ].INT;
00681   return retVal;
00682 }
00683 
00684 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t USBHHAL_GetHostChannelInts( void )
00685 {
00686   return USB->HAINT;
00687 }
00688 
00689 __STATIC_INLINE uint8_t USBHHAL_GetPortSpeed( void )
00690 {
00691   return ( USB->HPRT & _USB_HPRT_PRTSPD_MASK ) >> _USB_HPRT_PRTSPD_SHIFT;
00692 }
00693 
00694 __STATIC_INLINE void USBHHAL_PortReset( bool on )
00695 {
00696   if ( on )
00697   {
00698     DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '+' );
00699     USB->HPRT = ( USB->HPRT & ~HPRT_WC_MASK ) | USB_HPRT_PRTRST;
00700   }
00701   else
00702   {
00703     DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '-' );
00704     USB->HPRT &= ~( HPRT_WC_MASK | USB_HPRT_PRTRST );
00705   }
00706 }
00707 
00708 __STATIC_INLINE void USBHHAL_PortResume( bool on )
00709 {
00710   if ( on )
00711   {
00712     USB->HPRT = ( USB->HPRT & ~( HPRT_WC_MASK | USB_HPRT_PRTSUSP ) ) |
00713                 USB_HPRT_PRTRES;
00714   }
00715   else
00716   {
00717     USB->HPRT &= ~( HPRT_WC_MASK | USB_HPRT_PRTSUSP | USB_HPRT_PRTRES );
00718   }
00719 }
00720 
00721 __STATIC_INLINE void USBHHAL_PortSuspend( void )
00722 {
00723   USB->HPRT = ( USB->HPRT & ~HPRT_WC_MASK ) | USB_HPRT_PRTSUSP;
00724 }
00725 
00726 __STATIC_INLINE void USBHHAL_VbusOn( bool on )
00727 {
00728   if ( on )
00729   {
00730     USB->HPRT = ( USB->HPRT & ~HPRT_WC_MASK ) | USB_HPRT_PRTPWR;
00731     DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '/' );
00732   }
00733   else
00734   {
00735     USB->HPRT &= ~( HPRT_WC_MASK | USB_HPRT_PRTPWR );
00736     DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '\\' );
00737   }
00738 }

00743 #ifdef __cplusplus
00744 }
00745 #endif
00746 
00747 #endif /* defined( USB_DEVICE ) || defined( USB_HOST ) */
00748 #endif /* defined( USB_PRESENT ) && ( USB_COUNT == 1 ) */
